channel.title: Emote for fletching?
channel.description: Well I was looking over a few emote lists and couldn't find the emote for making arrow shafts, nor could I find the emote for making bows. If someone could tell me what they are that'd be nice :D

item.title: Emote for fletching?
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“Zukyak, post:9, topic:342030”][quote author=Natey link=topic=438440.msg3222386#msg3222386 date=1275273941]

I couldn’t find the bow stringing emote while I was working on my fletching, so I just decided to use no emote.
[/quote]Because there was no emote in the 317 revision, I posted that on your old topic, they added the string-bow emote in the early 400’s I think.

0,0 I made an old topic?..
Anyway That makes sense I suppose =,=
Thanks anyway guys :D[/quote]

He was talking about me, quite awhile ago I posted here asking if anyone knew the stringing animation ID.

Read full topic

Thanks anyway guys

item.title: Emote for fletching?
item.dc:creator: @smitherdrago smitherdrago
item.description:
@smitherdrago wrote:

public void fletchBow() {
	if (fletchAmount < 1) {
		resetAction();
		return;
	}
	fletchAmount--;
	closeInterface();
	IsBanking = false;
	pEmote = 885;

idk if thats what u need if u need a different on tell me il get u it

Read full topic
